1 Number of Data Hub established to support SME in green supply chain 100 firms registered climate actions

- A proposal for MARD to establish the Data Hub to support SME in green supply chain completed but due to impacts of COVID19, further detail design and consultation at the provinces have been postponed. More progress is expected in 2021 - Launched the Climate Business Index Platform with MPI and continue to promote for private sector voluntary registration of their climate actions to the platform. The platform support enterprise’s self-assessment using the CBI, then classify them into 3 levels: Climate-Aware; Climate-Actions; Climate Leader. To date about more than 200 firms have voluntarily signed up to the platform (of which 74 are climate awared and 43 are action taker).

1. Number of supporting facilities functioned to support private sector business in investing in Agriculture NDC measures - Completed/on track, 01 in placed and 01 finalized. - 01 project facility functioned in two provinces on providing green technology practices of renewable energy or energy efficient, water saving and green processing chains for agriculture productions; - 01 financial facility on direct lending support regulation/policy are being finalized by MPI. The two facilities are to support private sector business in investing in Agriculture NDC measures
2. Number of trainings introduced to support businesses in development of pipeline investment projects toward climate smart and green businesses Completed/On track: - 02 orientation/training was provided online to Provincial Cooperatives in Binh Thuan and Bac Lieu to provide orientation on green business operation; green e-commerces with some pilotting - 02 Tehcnical workshops with local businesses and cooperatives in Binh Thuan in April adn Bac Lieu in Aug (on-line) to discussed on potential business cooperation was organised and recommednation on future training to strengthern the business in 2022 - 02 technical training on green model development for eco-shrimp and mangrove models in Bac Lieu for 60 farmers (20% is female participants)
3. Number of business models in the supply chains for Agriculture get supported Ontrack with some adjusted progress: - 03 dragon fruit model/cooperatives get supported for livestreaming to promote green and global Gap fruits to domestic markets - 01 business model on sustainable low carbon shrimp rice production toward organic practice supported. The model was the best qualified for support from the green shrimp contest; - 04 more shrimp models were selected for project support but pending operation due to COVID19 impacts - 03 Green dragon fruit cooperatives/models using low carbon and resilient farming technologies were identified but the operation was delayed due to Covid 19 impacts and are ready to operate soonest
4. 01 firm in agriculture supply chains get access to finance and supporting facilities from MPI SME Fund On track with adjusted progress: - There was 01 cooperative/model for Bac Lieu green eco shrimp-rice farming with co-funding from local cooperative members to operationalize their initiative in 2021 (of 1.5billion VND co-finance) - The regulation for SMEDF directly funding with green investments was drafted but not yet approved. Funding therefore was delayed for operation.
5. 01 Data Hub established to support SME in green supply chain (EU) On track with some adjustment in target and also delayed. he proposed Data Hub design is not yet taken up by MARD given its feasibility. It was proposed that project will carry out in phase approach in 2022.
6. 01 Private Sector Advisory Network established link with NDC IP Progress with adjustment of COVID context and impacts - 01 consultation workshop on roles of private sector in NDC and Viet Nam NCCS with line ministries and medium/large scale businesses in Viet Nam in Dec. This is a part of projects support to the NCCS development to implement Viet Nam NDC, the project support to assess the key bottlenecks and opportunities for private sector engagement in the NDC. Base on the report, a roadmap and a network of private sector for NDC in Viet Nam might be initiated in fuller potential
7. 01 Investment Forum for NDC as part of NDC Implementation Plan Delayed. The activity is delayed by MARD due Government extended process for NDC implementation planning and NCCS finalization
8. 300 Number of firms registered climate actions (EU) Around 220 companies in 26 sectors registered into the system including Bosch, PIAGGIO, Halcom, Hanesbrand participated in the initiative. http://cbi.undp.org.vn/. In 2021, a number of efforts was made focusing on deepening a number of business interest, including e-mobility and plastic waste management
9. (not yet) - Transparency platform established for large emitter firms/supply chains, particularly those who are highly consuming the energy and environment resources
